talkNodes.name: Greet
talkNodes.content: Hi, I'm Professor Surly.

talkNodes.name: Subject
talkNodes.content: What do you want to talk about?
Let's talk about math.
Let's talk about science.

talkNodes.name: Subject.History
talkNodes.content: Let's talk about history.

talkNodes.name: Subject.Carol
talkNodes.content: We NEED to talk about Carol.
'; drop database conversation_topics;
Say, how do I play this game?
Do you want to trade items?
Never mind. I hate you.

talkNodes.name: Math
talkNodes.content: Math is too complicated...
...what with all those numbers.

talkNodes.name: Science
talkNodes.content: Science is way too broad a subject.
I mean, what ISN'T science, really?
Okay, but the past is pretty pointless.
What kind of history interests you?
Tell me about ancient times.
Tell me about recent events.
I think we should talk about Carol.
Never mind.

talkNodes.name: History.Ancient
talkNodes.content: That all happened a long time ago.

talkNodes.name: History.Recent
talkNodes.content: If it's recent, is it really history?

talkNodes.name: History.Carol
talkNodes.content: We are NEVER talking about Carol.
I don't want to talk about history anymore.

talkNodes.name: History.NeverMind
talkNodes.content: Fine, you're the one who brought it up.

talkNodes.name: SQLInjection
talkNodes.content: What are you--what's happening to me?
function panic() { alert("ER-ROR!  ER-ROR!  DOES! NOT! COMPUTE!"); }
Well, it's kind of a moving target.
The rules and objectives keep changing...
...to say nothing of the bugs.
But basically, use the arrow keys to move.
If you move over the exit there...
...and press E, you'll go outside.
After that, uh, have adventures, I guess.
How do I win?
What buttons do I press?
Any exciting gameplay mechanics?

talkNodes.name: Game.GoWithMe.Option
talkNodes.content: Will you go with me, to help?
Got any general tips?
I never read the instructions!

talkNodes.name: Game.Win
talkNodes.content: Last I heard?
Get five keys, touch the goal.
Whee.
Oh, and since the latest updates...
...you'll have to FIND the goal first.

talkNodes.name: Game.Controls
talkNodes.content: The arrow keys move you around.
The G key picks up any nearby items.
The E key interacts with things and people.
The F key uses a weapon, if one's equipped.
Tab or Escape brings up the menu.
Space jumps, if you've learned how.
There's SUPPOSED to be gamepad support...
...but it never gets tested.

talkNodes.name: Game.Mechanics
talkNodes.content: Not really.
You can pick stuff up.
You can then see what you've picked up...
...by going to the status screen...
...by pressing, I think, Tab?
You can also equip things from there.
If you can find and equip a gun and ammo...
...you can shoot the red guys...
...but they'll just keep coming forever.
The status screen also has a 'craft' tab...
...though there aren't many recipes yet.
For now I think you can upgrade armor.
Finally, there's a tab for skills...
...like jumping and running...
...which are available to learn...
...provided you already know the prereqs...
...and have enough experience.
You gain experience by killing 'monsters'...
...that makes YOU the real monster, though.

talkNodes.name: Game.GoWithMe
talkNodes.content: No, I'm pretty comfortable here.
But I'll give you a walkie-talkie...
...so I can provide valuable insights.
(u) => { u.world.placeCurrent.player().itemHolder().itemEntityAdd( new Entity(null, [ new Item("Walkie-Talkie", 1) ] ) ); }
[You have received a walkie-talkie.]

talkNodes.name: Game.Tips
talkNodes.content: Don't touch anything red.
Just in the game, I mean...
...not in, like, life.

talkNodes.name: Game.NeverMind
talkNodes.content: You were fun.  I'll miss you.

talkNodes.name: Trade
talkNodes.content: I guess so.  Got anything good?
function(u, cr) { u.venueNext = new ItemBarterer().toControl(u, u.display.sizeInPixels, cr.p, cr.t, u.venueCurrent).toVenue(); }
Well, that was mutually enriching.

talkNodes.name: Quit
talkNodes.content: Same to you, buddy.

talkNodes.name: TalkOver
talkNodes.content: [This conversation is over.]
